meanings.definition: People who have retired from work.
meanings.sent1: The retirees gathered at the park for their daily walk.
meanings.sent2: Many retirees enjoy spending time with their grandchildren.
meanings.sent3: The retirees joked about finally having time to relax after years of hard work.
meanings.sent4: The retirees were like butterflies emerging from their cocoons of employment.
meanings.sent5: The retirees' laughter filled the room, a symphony of newfound freedom.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals who have stopped working due to age or other reasons.
meanings.sent1: The retirees in the community center shared stories of their past careers.
meanings.sent2: Retirees often volunteer to give back to their communities.
meanings.sent3: The retirees organized a potluck to celebrate their newfound leisure time.
meanings.sent4: The retirees were a flock of birds soaring into the sunset of retirement.
meanings.sent5: The retirees' wisdom shone through their conversations, a beacon for the younger generation.
